name: Temporary Tool
summary: You conjure a temporary simple tool, such as a shovel or rope into your hands.
description: You conjure a temporary simple tool, such as a shovel or rope into your hands. It lasts until it is used for a single activity or for 1 minute, whichever comes first, after which it disappears. The tool is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus canâ€™t be sold or passed off as a genuine item.
duration: until used or 1 minute; see text
